content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 40, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 29, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 53, "index": 30}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 42, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft the iron pickaxe, I first need to craft a stick. To do so I need to place planks in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move one plank from slot 22 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 40, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 29, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 53, "index": 30}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 42, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]
thought: Since I have already placed a plank in slot 1, I need to place another one in slot 4 to complete the recipe. Therefore I will move a plank from slot 22 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 40, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 29, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 53, "index": 30}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 42, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the sticks, I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 40, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 29, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 53, "index": 30}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 42, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft an iron_pickaxe, I need to place an iron ingot on top of a stick. Therefore, I will first move the iron_ingot from slot 27 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 40, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 29, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 53, "index": 30}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 42, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]
thought: I have moved the iron_ingot to slot 1, but I still need two more iron_ingots to complete the recipe. Therefore, I will move another iron_ingot from slot 27 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "heavy_weighted_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 40, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 29, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 53, "index": 30}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 42, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]
thought: I have moved two iron_ingots to slots 1 and 2, but I still need one more iron_ingot to complete the recipe. Therefore, I will move another iron_ingot from slot 27 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 3 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 40, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 29, "index": 26}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 53, "index": 30}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 42, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]

Ok

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1
